by.horsego.dao

Class GameHorsesDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.horsego.dao.GameHorsesDao

  • public class GameHorsesDao
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for accessing the DB table game_horses. To get an instance of this class call the method DaoFactory.getGameHorsesDao() on an object of the DaoFactory class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mikita Masukhranau
    See Also:
    Dao, DaoFactory
